007package imagingbook.violajones.data;
008
009import imagingbook.core.resource.NamedResource;
010
011/**
012 * This class gives easy access to the Haar training sets, obtained from OpenCV. The associated XML files are located in
013 * relative resource directory "./xml".
014 *
015 * @author WB
016 */
017public enum HaarTrainingSet implements NamedResource {
018        HaarCascadeEye("haarcascade_eye.xml"),
019        FrontalFaceDefault("haarcascade_frontalface_default.xml"),
020        FrontalFaceAlt2("haarcascade_frontalface_alt2.xml");
021        
022        private static final String BASEDIR = "xml";
023        private final String filename;
024        
025        private HaarTrainingSet(String filename) {
026                this.filename = filename;
027        }
028        
029        @Override
030        public String getFileName() {
031                return filename;
032        }
033        
034        @Override
035        public String getRelativeDirectory() {
036                return BASEDIR;
037        }
038        
039        //--------------------------------------------
040
041        public static void main(String[] args) {
042                for (NamedResource nr : HaarTrainingSet.values()) {
043                        System.out.println("resource URL = " + nr.getURL());
044                }
045        }
046
047
048
049}
